text: Man kꞌo ta xuqujeꞌ jun winaq ri kuya kꞌakꞌ vino pa qꞌeꞌl taq tzꞌuꞌm taq qꞌebꞌal, rumal chi ri kꞌakꞌ vino xaq katix bꞌik riꞌ, xuqujeꞌ ri tzꞌuꞌm taq qꞌebꞌal ketꞌoqopin riꞌ.5:37 Xkitꞌis utzꞌuꞌmal awajibꞌ rech xkibꞌan alaj taq tzꞌuꞌm kꞌolibꞌal uwaꞌl uva. Ri qꞌeꞌl tzꞌuꞌm are kanoj che ri uwaꞌl uva, katꞌoqopinik je ta ne chi xa xtꞌoqopixik. Rumal riꞌ xwi kakoj ri kꞌakꞌ tzꞌuꞌm kꞌolibꞌal chuyakik ri uwaꞌl ri uva.
